contact.address: 3901 Timbet Dr SE, Salem, OR 97317, USA

hero.headline: Transform Your Outdoor Space with Expert Landscaping
hero.subhead: Creating beautiful and functional landscapes in Salem, OR, and surrounding areas.

features.title: Lawn Care & Maintenance
features.description: Keep your lawn healthy and vibrant with our comprehensive lawn care services. We offer mowing, fertilization, aeration, and more.

features.title: Landscape Design & Installation
features.description: Transform your property with a custom landscape design tailored to your needs and preferences. We handle everything from concept to completion.

features.title: Hardscaping Services
features.description: Enhance your outdoor living space with beautiful and durable hardscaping features. We specialize in patios, walkways, retaining walls, and more.

reviews.name: Sarah M.
reviews.text: Russell's Landscape Services Inc. did an amazing job on our backyard! They were professional, efficient, and the results exceeded our expectations.

reviews.name: John B.
reviews.text: We've been using Russell's for our lawn care for years, and we couldn't be happier. Our lawn always looks fantastic!
